titles.title: Providing for consideration of the Senate amendment to the House amendment to the Senate amendment to the bill (H.R. 3082) making appropriations for military construction, the Department of Veterans Affairs, and related agencies for the fiscal year ending September 30, 2010, and for other purposes.

Providing for consideration of the Senate amendment to the House amendment to the Senate amendment to the bill (H.R. 3082) making appropriations for military construction, the Department of Veterans Affairs, and related agencies for the fiscal year ending September 30, 2010, and for other purposes.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 111-694, by Mr. Polis (CO).

The resolution provides for consideration of the Senate amendment to the House amendment to the Senate amendment to H.R. 3082. It provides one hour of debate on the motion. The resolution waives all points of order against consideration of the motion. The Senate amendment shall be considered as read.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 259.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 1782.
The previous question was ordered without objection.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: Sets forth the rule for consideration of the Senate amendment to the House amendment to the Senate amendment to the bill (H.R. 3082) making appropriations for military construction, the Department of Veterans Affairs, and related agencies for the fiscal year ending September 30, 2010.
